entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
